result.eng: My husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ga: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.orig: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.html: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Is fada m'ḟear céile imiṫe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.

result.html: Seo m'fhear céileThis is my husband.
result.ponchtml: Seo m'ḟear céileThis is my husband.

result.html: Tá Treasa scarthaTreasa is separated [from her husband].
result.ponchtml: Tá Treasa scarṫaTreasa is separated [from her husband].

result.eng: Is your husband with you in An Spidéal?
result.ga: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa Spidéal
result.orig: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa Spidéal
result.html: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa SpidéalIs your husband with you in An Spidéal?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil d'ḟear céile liḃ sa SpidéalIs your husband with you in An Spidéal?

result.eng: My husband died two years ago.
result.ga: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.orig: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.html: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shinMy husband died two years ago.
result.ponchtml: Fuair m'ḟear céile bás ḋá ḃliain ó ẛinMy husband died two years ago.

result.eng: My husband is from Ros Muc.
result.html: Is as Ros Muc m'fhearMy husband is from Ros Muc.
result.ponchtml: Is as Ros Muc m'ḟearMy husband is from Ros Muc.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: My husband is unemployed at present.
result.html: Tá m'fhear dífhostaithe faoi láthairMy husband is unemployed at present.
result.ponchtml: Tá m'ḟear díḟostaiṫe faoi láṫairMy husband is unemployed at present.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.orig: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.html: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: Cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
